gamelogic

Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • gamelogic.Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent the maze of the game.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description

      Creates a maze with only the border filled.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Maze

        public Maze()
        Creates an empty maze.

      • Maze

        public Maze(char[][] grid)
     throws NotFound
        Creates a maze from the given grid.

        Checks the grid for the position of the sword and exit and creates the maze accordingly.

        Parameters:
        grid - grid to build the maze from
        Throws:
        NotFound - if sword or exit are missing from grid.

      • Maze

        public Maze(int maze_size)
        Creates a randomly generated maze with the given size.
        Parameters:
        maze_size - size of the maze

      • Maze

        public Maze(int maze_size,
            java.lang.String empty)
        Creates a maze with only the border filled.
        Parameters:
        maze_size - size of the maze
        empty - string used as placeholder
